channel.title: How to change xp ratE?
channel.description: For example if my server has this so everytime you hit a npc you get like 650 xp where do i change that to make it a bit harder to train.

item.title: How to change xp ratE?
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

thanks i found it in player.java

but do you know how to add safe zones?
since i have added but it’s still not a safe zone what more should i do?
this is the code i have:

public boolean nonWildPvP() { if (absX >= 2812 && absX <= 2806 && absY >= 3443 && absY <= 3438) { return true; } else { return false; } }

Read full topic

item.title: How to change xp ratE?
item.dc:creator: @tb1 tb
item.description:
@tb1 wrote:

make a new account and login, then logout. Go to character files and open that one you just made. Copy the coords they were last at (starting coords), then search them in the search box. They will bring you there, so you can change it to whichever you like.

Or you can check player.java or playerhandler.java or something, idk really what base do you have?

Read full topic

item.title: How to change xp ratE?
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

Ok i got that it worked thank you but,

one last question it’s easy i think?? where do i edit where new people start when they log in the first time

item.title: How to change xp ratE?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Read my post over again. All you need to change is 650, which is the experience rate.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change xp ratE?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

If your experience rate is actually set to 650 then search in client.java for

TotalExp = (double)(650*hitDiff);

The number is the EXP that you gain each time you hit a 1. Make sure to change all the others, there isn’t just one.

Read full topic
